Class Pants

  • java.lang.Object
    • Gear
      • Pants

  • public class Pants
extends Gear
    The Boots class is a child of Gear. It has a bonus of increased endurance to the character. The character's time length of sprint is increased by the endurance trait.
    Author:
    David Iacono CSC 212 Brown 04/16/2013
